title: Levels?
body: Ok maybe I'm dumb.. I can't find any help on finding out how to post on this board. It's says I need to have levels? For a forum? How do I gain levels?? This is the only place it lets me post.

replies.body: Hah no comments yet? well maybe if I comment on my own post I can get levels! Kinda ironic... it's against the rules to be a troll.. and yet in order to use this forum you have to be a troll. Ah well

Sometimes if you haven't used the boards in a while, your Summoner and Boards profiles will have fallen out of sync. It seems your post here has caused a sync to happen, as you show as level 29 now.

Happy posting!
Maybe this will force a sync for me too.

So it's based on your level in game? I couldn't find anywhere that explained that so I wasn't sure. I know a lot of forums have their own level system, you get "exp" from posting and commenting. Which I think just leads to more trolling. Good to know that this isn't the case.
